stages.logText: I found a hidden room for rite in basement of a strange ancient temple.
I found the old notes. The only words I  recognised are "... altar... To summon... polished gems...". Should I put  polished gems on altar to summon someone?
I  put  a polished gem on altar. Several aggressive spirits  appeared.
Strange glowing runes on the floor stop me.
I found a necklace with a gem on one of spirits in the temple and put the gem on altar. A slight earthquake shook the walls of the temple.
Looks like the fallen boulder somehow broke the barrier runes.
I got the ancient scroll.
I told Rorthron about the ancient scroll. He wants to look it.
I don't have the ancient scroll anymore.
I gave the ancient scroll to Rorthron.  He promised to share the results of the research and return me the scroll. I should visit him later.

Rorthron said that he could not return the scroll because it  had damaged during the experiments. However, Rorthron said that the research was successful and in exchange for a few polished gems, he would be able to make me scrolls like this.
Rorthron said that he had made progress in making the scrolls and could make a better ones now. However now it will cost  gold and  require polished sparkling gems.
Rorthron said that he found new information about the ancient temple. If I put a powerful dark artifact  the altar, something will probably  happen.
I put a powerful dark artifact  the altar. The altar exploded and a great spirit attaked me.
I defeted the great spirit in the temple.
I've found hydra's lair.
Hydra attaked me!
Rorthron sell me the first scroll.
Rorthron sell me the second scroll.
Rorthron sell me the 3rd scroll.
Rorthron sell me the 4th scroll.
Rorthron sell me the 5th scroll.
